page.title: 17Life at the Priory, Turvey
page.content: In 1981 Turvey Abbey became the Priory of Our Lady of Peace. 16 Sisters now live here, adjacent is a community of 7 monks.The day of a Benedictine Nun follows the following timetable: 5.50 Rise, bell at 6.15 summons them 6.20 Office of Readings (40 mins.) followed by housework 7.15 Office of Praise Lauds 8.00 Breakfast in silence, reading and prayer 9.15 Housework,tapestry, weaving, tending goats, on a rota basis 12.00 Finish work, change 12.15 Mass. 1.15 Dinner, eat with monks, in silence except on Feast Days someone will read 2.15 Back to work 4.30 Tea and conversation with Sisters 6.00 Vespers,7.00 Supper and play 8.00 Compline prayers and silence
